instructions: Image titled Turn on Flight Mode on Windows Phone 7 Step 1 1 Access the Applications list. Flick to the left on the "Start" screen. Image titled Turn on Flight Mode on Windows Phone 7 Step 2 2 Tap the Settings options. Image titled Turn on Flight Mode on Windows Phone 7 Step 3 3 Tap Airplane Mode . Image titled Turn on Flight Mode on Windows Phone 7 Step 4 4 Slide the bar to select "On" or "Off". Advertisement
